Outbound network connections initiated b.Action: Correlate Zeek http.log entries for connections to suspicious URLs. Identify new outbound connections (Zeek conn.log, Windows Event ID 5156) originating from the user's endpoint that start shortly (e.g., < 60 seconds) after the suspicious web activity.
